document_name: Institution Capacity Building for Gender Equality

outputs.output_descr:
Component 1 . Modelling gender mainstreaming through selected ministries
1. Gender Issues mainstreamed into line ministries.                                                                                                                                                   2. Integrate gender responsive mechanisms into programme budgeting frameworks of line Ministries.                                                                 
3. Gender sensitive indicators included into ANDS log frames for different line Ministries.

Component 2.  Sustainable knowledge building and management on gender.
1. Gender Studies Institute (GSI) strengthened to act as a focal point for the development of knowledge encompassing different activities for a gender focused approach- in research, training and networking.
2. Foundation laid for future collection of gender sensitive data and analysis.

Component 3. Towards women empowerment: conflict resolution, justice, security and peace at the sub-national level.

1. Capacity of provincial, distric and community level officials as well as religious leaders developed to promote empowerment of women.
2. Eight legal help centers established in Herat and Mazar provinces.
3. Two media centres established at Herat and Balkh Provinces.
4. Community based demand driven undertaking by CSOs.
5. Women at sub-national levels socially and economically empowered.

Enhanced policy development capacity of Ministry of Women Affairs through the establishment of Women Policy Development Center (WPDC), for ensuring other line ministries are able to develop and implement gender sensitive policies and strategies.
Strengthened subnational institutions to promote socio-economic empowerment of women.

project_descr: Institutional Capacity Building for Gender Equality - to develop effective gender mainstreaming models and strengthening the capacity of government ministries
project_title: Institutional Capacity Building for Gender Equality
